FM Meets Chinese Ambassador 
    Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun met and had a talk with Chinese Ambassador to the DPRK Wu Donghe who paid a farewell call on him on Thursday.

articles.title: Congratulations to Ukrainian PM
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Chad 
    Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of greetings to Idriss Deby, president of Chad, on the occasion of the 46th anniversary of its independence.
 The message sincerely wished the president and people of Chad great successes in their work for peace of the country, national unity and economic prosperity.

articles.title: Jo Myong Rok Meets Chinese Ambassador
articles.content:
Congratulations to Ukrainian PM 
    Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, sent a congratulatory message to Viktor Yanukovich upon his appointment as prime minister of Ukraine.
 The message sincerely wished the prime minister success in his responsible work, expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would expand in conformity with the expectation and interests of the two peoples.

Jo Myong Rok Meets Chinese Ambassador
    Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Jo Myong Rok, first vice-chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, together with Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army Kim Il Chol, minister of the People's Armed Forces, met and conversed with outgoing Chinese Ambassador to the DPRK Wu Donghe on Thursday.
 On hand were KPA General Pak Jae Gyong, KPA Major General An Yong Gi and the military attache of the Chinese embassy here.
